definitions.text: a person who exercises control over workers
examples: if you want to leave early you have to ask the foreman

definitions.text: a person responsible for hiring workers
examples: the boss hired three more men for the new job

definitions.text: a person who exercises control and makes decisions
examples: he is his own boss now

definitions.text: a leader in a political party who controls votes and dictates appointments
examples: party bosses have a reputation for corruption

definitions.text: a circular rounded projection or protuberance
wild and domestic cattle; in some classifications placed in the subfamily Bovinae or tribe Bovini
